/* getCarStatType */ SELECT CAR_CLASS_TEXT AS type FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_HR_CAR_REQ WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(START_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY CAR_CLASS_TEXT

/* getCarStat */ SELECT COUNT(CAR_CLASS_SN) AS value FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_HR_CAR_REQ WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(START_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY CAR_CLASS_TEXT

/* getRoomStatType */ SELECT ROOM_CLASS_TEXT AS type FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ROOM_REQ WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(START_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY ROOM_CLASS_TEXT

/* getRoomStat */ SELECT COUNT(ROOM_REQ_SN) AS value FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ROOM_REQ WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(START_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY ROOM_CLASS_TEXT
/* getCarCodeInfo */ SELECT IHCC.* FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_HR_CAR_CODE IHCC WHERE CAR_CODE_SN = #{carCodeSn}

/* getCarCodeList */ SELECT RE.* FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROW_NUM, IHCC.* FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_HR_CAR_CODE IHCC, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP WHERE VISIBLE = 'Y' ORDER BY IHCC.REG_DATE ) RE ORDER BY RE.ROW_NUM DESC
/* getRoomCodeInfo */ SELECT IRC.* FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ROOM_CODE IRC WHERE ROOM_CODE_SN = #{roomCodeSn}

/* getRoomCodeList */ SELECT RE.* FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROW_NUM, IRC.* FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ROOM_CODE IRC, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP WHERE VISIBLE = 'Y' ORDER BY IRC.REG_DATE ) RE ORDER BY RE.ROW_NUM DESC
